Class MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissueInput

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissue class. This assumes infinite cylinders are concentric and lie entirely within a layer.

public class MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissueInput : TissueInput, ITissueInput
